description: This file defines an agent with session state management using SQLite storage, including a tool to add items to a shopping list and example interactions demonstrating session persistence.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with session state, model, tools, and storage capabilities.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class for interacting with OpenAI's chat models.

classes.name: SqliteStorage
classes.description: Handles session state persistence using a SQLite database.

methods.name: add_item
methods.description: Adds an item to the agent's shopping list session state.

methods.name: agent.print_response
methods.description: Sends a prompt to the agent and prints the response, optionally streaming output.
